objects.text:
• Elegant halter neck design
• Vintage-inspired floral print
• Wrap-style with ruffle hem
• Perfect for summer events

product_details.name: Floral Dreams Halter Neck Dress - Perfect Summer Romance
product_details.description:
• Elegant halter neck design with adjustable tie
• Beautiful vintage-inspired floral print in soft yellow and pink tones
• Wrap-style silhouette with romantic ruffle hem detail
• Lightweight and breathable fabric perfect for summer wear
• Empire waist design for a flattering fit
• Sleeveless style with open back detail
• Mini length with feminine wrap overlay
• Easy care fabric blend suitable for daily wear
• Available in sizes XS to XL
• Perfect for garden parties, brunches, and summer events

banner_details:
This banner presents a stylish and summery promotional layout centered around a fashion product. The composition features a minimal and warm design, starting with a soft beige background enhanced by semi-transparent pastel circles and wave patterns for added texture. A bold heading (`heading`) grabs attention at the top in vibrant orange tones, followed by a slightly lighter subheading (`subheading`) that enhances the seasonal theme. A descriptive bullet-point list (`description`) provides feature highlights of the product. The price section (`price`) is prominently displayed at the bottom left, complemented by a bold call-to-action button (`cta`) in a rounded rectangle (`cta_button_background`). A central image (`product_image`) showcases the product model, anchoring the layout visually.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Peach: `#FFF5E6`
- Soft Orange: `#FFEAD1`
- Pastel Yellow: `#FFE8B3`
- Muted Pink: `#FFD6D6`
- Warm Coral: `#D46C4E`
- Light Coral: `#E9896A`
- Deep Brown: `#8E3200`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a summery halter-neck dress with a vibrant and youthful color palette. Dominant colors include pastel yellow (#FDE9A6) as the base, lavender pink (#DDA0DD) for floral motifs, and soft olive green (#A3B18A) used for detailing. These hues blend softly, creating a harmonious and eye-catching aesthetic. The pastel yellow provides a bright, sunny backdrop, while the subtle purple and green prints add feminine charm and visual texture, yet remain delicately balanced so that no element overshadows the other. For a banner, complement these colors with soft cream (#FFF9F0) or muted blush (#F7CAC9) for a light, soothing look.
